ayas.text: alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū `an sabīlillāhi aḍalla a`mālahum
wal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti wa-āmanū bimā nuzzila `alā muḥammadin wahuwal ḥaqqu min rabbihim kaffara `anhum sayyi-ātihim wa-aṣlaḥa bālahum
dhālika bi-annal ladhīna kafarut-taba`ul bāṭila wa-annal ladhīna āmanut-taba`ul ḥaqqa min rabbihim ۚ kadhālika yaḍribullāhu linnāsi amthālahum

fa-idhā laqītumul ladhīna kafarū faḍarbar riqābi ḥattā idhā athkhantumūhum fashuddul wathāqa fa-immā mannan ba`du wa immā fidā-an ḥattā taḍa`al ḥarbu awzārahā ۚ dhālika walaw yashā-ullāhu lantaṣara minhum walākin liyabluwa ba`ḍakum biba`ḍ ۗ wal ladhīna qutilū fī sabīlillāhi falan yuḍilla a`mālahum
sayahdīhim wayuṣliḥu bālahum
wayudkhiluhumul jannata `arrafahā lahum
yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū in tanṣurullāha yanṣurkum wayuthabbit aqdāmakum
wal ladhīna kafarū fata`sal lahum wa-aḍalla a`mālahum
dhālika bi-annahum karihū mā anzalallāhu fa-aḥbaṭa a`mālahum
afalam yasīrū fil-arḍi fayanẓurū kayfa kāna `āqibatul ladhīna min qablihim ۚ dammarallāhu `alayhim ۖ walilkāfirīna amthāluhā
dhālika bi-annallāha mawlal ladhīna āmanū wa-annal kāfirīna lā mawlā lahum
innallāha yudkhilul ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhār ۖ wal ladhīna kafarū yatamatta`ūna waya-kulūna kamā ta-kulul-an`āmu wan nāru mathwan lahum
waka-ayyin min qaryatin hiya ashaddu quwwatan min qaryatikal latī akhrajatka ahlaknāhum falā nāṣira lahum
afaman kāna `alā bayyinatim min rabbihi kaman zuyyina lahu sū-u `amalihi wattaba`ū ahwā-ahum

mathalul jannatil latī wu`idal muttaqūn ۖ fīhā anhārun min mā-in ghayri āsinin wa-anhārun min labanin lam yataghayyar ṭa`muhu wa-anhārun min khamrin ladhhatin lishhāribīna wa-anhārun min `asalin muṣaffā ۖ walahum fīhā min kullith thamarāti wa maghfiratun min rabbihim ۖ kaman huwa khālidun fin nāri wasuqū mā-an ḥamīman faqaṭṭa`a am`ā-ahum
wa minhum man yastami`u ilayka ḥattā idhā kharajū min `indika qālū lilladhīna ūtul `il-ma mādhā qāla ānifā ۚ ulā-ikal ladhīna ṭaba`allāhu `alā qulūbihim wattaba`ū ahwā-ahum
wal ladhīnah-tadaw zādahum hudan wa-ātāhum taqwāhum
fahal yanẓurūna illas sā`ata an ta-tiyahum baghtah ۖ faqad jā-a ashrāṭuhā ۚ fa-annā lahum idhā jā-at hum dhikrāhum
fa`lam annahu lā ilāha illallāhu wastaghfir lidhanbika walil-mu-minīna wal mu-mināt ۗ wallāhu ya`lamu mutaqallabakum wa mathwākum

wayaqūlul ladhīna āmanū lawlā nuzzilat sūrah ۖ fa-idhā unzilat sūratun muḥkamatun wadhukira fīhal qitālu ra-aytal ladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun yanẓurūna ilayka naẓaral maghshiyyi `alayhi minal mawt ۖ fa-awlā lahum
ṭā`atun waqawlun ma`rūf ۚ fa-idhā `azamal-amru falaw ṣadaqullāha lakāna khayral lahum
fahal `asaytum in tawallaytum an tufsidū fil-arḍi watuqaṭṭi`ū arḥāmakum
ulā-ikal ladhīna la`anahumullāhu fa-aṣammahum wa-a`mā abṣārahum
afalā yatadabbarūnal qur-āna am `alā qulūbin aqfāluhā
innal ladhīnar-taddū `alā adbārihim min ba`di mā tabayyana lahumul hudash shayṭānu sawwala lahum wa-amlā lahum
dhālika bi-annahum qālū lilladhīna karihū mā nazzalallāhu sanuṭī`ukum fī ba`ḍil-amr ۖ wallāhu ya`lamu isrārahum
fakayfa idhā tawaffat-humul malā-ikatu yaḍribūna wujūhahum wa-adbārahum
dhālika bi-annahumut-taba`ū mā askhaṭallāha wakarihū riḍwānahu fa-aḥbaṭa a`mālahum
am ḥasibal ladhīna fī qulūbihim maraḍun an lan yukhrijallāhu aḍghānahum
walaw nashā-u la-araynākahum fala`araftahum bisīmāhum ۚ walata`rifannahum fī laḥnil qawl ۚ wallāhu ya`lamu a`mālakum
walanabluwannakum ḥattā na`lamal mujāhidīna minkum waṣ ṣābirīna wanabluwa akhbārakum
innal ladhīna kafarū waṣaddū `an sabīlillāhi washāqqur rasūla min ba`di mā tabayyana lahumul hudā lan yaḍurrullāha shay-an wasayuḥbiṭu a`mālahum
yā-ayyuhal ladhīna āmanū aṭī`ullāha wa-aṭī`ur rasūla walā tubṭilū a`mālakum
innal ladhīna kafarū waṣaddū `an sabīlillāhi thumma mātū wahum kuffārun falan yaghfirallāhu lahum
falā tahinū watad`ū ilas sal-mi wa-antumul-a`lawna wallāhu ma`akum walan yatirakum a`mālakum
innamal ḥayātud dunyā la`ibun walahw ۚ wa in tu-minū watattaqū yu-tikum ujūrakum walā yas-alkum amwālakum
in yas-alkumūhā fayuḥfikum tabkhalū wayukhrij aḍghānakum

hā-antum hā-ulā-i tud`awna litunfiqū fī sabīlillāhi faminkum man yabkhal ۖ wa man yabkhal fa-innamā yabkhalu `an nafsih ۚ wallāhul ghaniyyu wa-antumul fuqarā-u ۚ wa in tatawallaw yastabdil qawman ghayrakum thumma lā yakūnū amthālakum
